kv9.6:1.5: Hañci atītārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:1.8: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:2.3: Nanu atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:2.5: Hañci atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:3.5: Hañci anāgatārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:3.8: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:4.3: Nanu anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:4.5: Hañci anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:5.1: ☑ Paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.3: Atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.5: paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.7: Anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:6.1: ☑ Atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:6.3: Paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:7.1: ☑ Anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:7.3: Paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:8.6: Hañci atītānāgataṁ natthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
